page.title: 13Housing:World's End
page.content: Lots of new houses have been built up next to old houses which are a few centuries old. These house many families in them. Many old houses will be knocked down to make room for estates. At least one estate was built next to a large field which must pollute the crops to a large extent. These houses are quite good because they are built very quickly and are designed for young married couples. This has bought pubs, bus stops and a garage to this area. The area has virtually turned into a dormitory town, a town housing people who commute to large cities everyday. Many young couples move out of the area when married, or soon after.
